(1327x243+227)/64 mod 128 = 50. (1327x243+227)/128 mod 64 = 25. (1327x729+809)/256 mod 32 = 6. (1327x729+809)/512 mod 16 = 3. (1327x2187+2939)/1024 mod 8 = 5. (1327x6561+9841)/2048 mod 4 = 0. (1327x6561+9841)/4096 mod 2 = 0. (1327x6561+9841)/8192 mod 1 = 0.
